resources.string: Quotes Over Dogs generates lighthearted images of cute dogs with simple words of wisdom.
Quotes Over Dogs ues the Retrofit library to make API calls to \'https://random.dog\' for its images and \'api.forismatic.com\' for its quotes.
Quotes Over Dogs uses the Palette library to detect the major color in the image and sets the color as the quote background.
Quotes Over Dogs uses the ACRA library to send crash reports and bug reports.
Quotes Over Dogs uses SVGs generated through \'https://icons8.com\'.

Quotes Over Dogs uses \'Amatic SC\', \'Cinzel\', \'Courgette\', \'Dancing Script\', \'Dosis\', \'Laila\', \'Merriweather\', \'Niconne\', \'Open Sans\', \'PT Serif\', and \'Tangerine\' fonts. All fonts acquired through Google Fonts.
Dogs need rest too! Please find attached the bug report for your application.
